nodes.text: Paul Danner is an author who wrote six short stories for the Star Wars Adventure Journal: One of a Kind, Easy Credits, Small Favors, The Last Hand, No Disintegrations, Please, and Two for One. Later, No Disintegrations, Please and The Last Hand were reprinted for Tales from the New Republic in 1999. His short stories can also be found on Hyperspace.
He was also the author of Wretched Hives of Scum & Villainy, a sourcebook for the Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
